responses.rationale: The segment reports locations affected, not capabilities or preparedness.
Describes a measure ('Agriculture Department pays farmers') without active reassurance.
The segment describes a potential negative consequence, not capabilities or preparedness.
Describes implemented safeguards ('temporarily banned poultry community sales') without active reassurance.
Describes preparedness measures ('asking people... to watch out for signs... and call a vet') without active reassurance.
The segment describes how the virus is carried, not capabilities or preparedness.

The segment reports confirmed cases, not capabilities or preparedness.

Reports future production projections ('Brazil will produce up to 14.9 million tons') as hopeful possibilities without active reassurance.
Reports future production projections and increase ('Brazil will produce up to 14.9 million tons', 'represents an annual output increase') as hopeful possibilities without active reassurance.
Reports future market share projection ('Brazil is expected to hold a nearly 38% market share') as a hopeful possibility without active reassurance.
Quotes an expert praising an ability ('praised Brazil's ability to protect') as a statement about capability without active reassurance.
Quotes an expert praising an ability ('praised Brazil's ability to protect') and cautioning, without active reassurance.
Reports future export projections ('Brazilian chicken exports in 2023 will end at a record') as hopeful possibilities without active reassurance.
Reports future export projections ('Brazilian chicken exports will reach up to 5.3 million tons') as hopeful possibilities without active reassurance.
Reports a safeguard/response measure ('Supermarket restriction applies') without active reassurance.

Reports a safeguard/response measure ('A 24-egg limit applies') without active reassurance.

Describes response measures/support ('working closely with all of our suppliers', 'providing support to the industry') without active reassurance.
The segment reports detection details, not capabilities or preparedness.

Describes effort being made ('working as hard as possible to maintain availability') as a response without active reassurance.
The segment quotes an expert giving advice, not capabilities or preparedness.

The segment quotes an expert interpreting an action, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes a property type, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes where infections occurred, not capabilities or preparedness.
